ModMetadata.Name: NetworkingFixMod
ModMetadata.Author: Spacebuilder2020
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]NetworkingFixMod[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
Multiple Network Related Patches including:
Patches connections to prevent a timeout when a client is kicked at initial connection. (Invalid password, blacklisting, invalid version).
Extends Kick command so that a player name can be specified instead of a steamid. Requires exact name, if name is not exact, will try to find possible options and print them out.
